info.name: ex-sbom
info.description:
# Overview

This file is the api documentation of the [ex-sbom](https://github.com/nics-tw/ex-sbom).

query.description: required, the name of the SBOM file(currently json format supported only)

request.description: Upload SBOM API is responsible for upload the SBOM data into the backend side of ex-sbom.

response.name: unknown type content error

query.description: required, the param should be the existing file in the backend side.

request.description: Delete SBOM API is responsible for deleting SBOM data in the backend side.

query.description: required, the name of the SBOM file(currently json format supported only)

request.description: Get component list by level API represent the util to get the component list by dependency leveling. It may be root level or any kind of indirect importing level.

query.description: required, the name of the SBOM file(currently json format supported only)

request.description: Get component list by dependency API represent the util for listing the dependency of each component. Notice that if a component/package does not possess any dependency, it will be excluded from the response result.
